sourcesContent: import React from "react"; import ReactDOM from "react-dom"; import { Row, Column, Modal, ModalContent, ModalHeader, ModalFooter, ModalBody, Close, Button, TextArea, Label, Input, P } from "./styled"; class EmailModal extends React.Component { render() { const { isOpen } = this.props; const { sent } = this.props; if(!isOpen) { return null; } return ReactDOM.createPortal ( ×
